name: crop-image
description: Crop and send image to s3
author: <arnaud.beun@aircall.io>

scripts.deploy: npm run docker:build && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.package:prod: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target:/opt/app/target lambda_build:latest serverless package --stage prod --package target/prd
scripts.deploy:prod: docker run --rm -v ~/.aws/:/root/.aws:ro -v $(pwd)/target:/opt/app/target lambda_build:latest serverless deploy --stage prod --package target/prd
